text: Ureueng meuiman bandum keu Tuhan Ngon rasul Tuhan ureueng meutuah Nyan keuh ureueng nyan ureueng beuna that i Chahid dum meuhat gopnyan bak Allah Ureueng nyan chahid nibak Po gopnyan Pahla keu gopnyan Neubri le leupah Cahya ureueng nyan Neubri peungeuh that Nyang kaphe meuhat lam apui mirah Nyang jikheun sulet dum ayat Kamoe Nuraka jih nyoe teumpat geukeubah
